DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test the safety and effectiveness of MK6213 as compared to MK6213/Atorvastatin in patients (18 to 75 years) with high cholesterol.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of MK6213 Co-Administered With Atorvastatin in Patients With Hypercholesterolemia (MK-6213-006)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patient is 18 to 75 years of age at the time of the study with high cholesterol can have diabetes mellitus but is not currently on lipid lowering therapy have a stable weight for >6 weeks Patient has significant cardiovascular (heart), renal (kidney), neurologic (nervous system), respiratory (lung), hepatic (liver) or metabolic disease history of mental instability or drug/alcohol abuse within the past 5 years pregnant or nursing; HIV positive; history of cancer within the past 5 years or participation in an investigational trial within the last 30 days
